resources.string: Tap the meteors to collect cash!
Congratulations!\n You have beaten the game.

Welcome to SpaceFarm!

 Spacefarm is a partially automated clicker application where the goal is to buy more and more planets and slowly expand into the galaxy.
 
•Coded by: Caleb Turcotte 
•Music created by: Michael Le 
•Graphic designs by: Gowri Raveenthiran & Caleb Turcotte
•Tap the harvesters to buy new planets or upgrade bought planets.\n •Once Auto Farm is unlocked a Planet will store extra money over time for its next tap!

To play the minigame tap meteors as they fall down. But avoid tapping any bombs!
 
 •Earn up to 5 percent of your current total of money earned.
 
 •You can play for free every 5 minutes or immediately by watching an advertisement.
Tap the gold meteors to earn points!
If you tap a red meteor you will lose a point!
